title: Time Out 1000 Things To Do In London
description: 1000 Things to do in London (third edition) is packed with inspiring ideas of how to spend one's time in the Big Smoke. However well you know London (or if you don't), there's always more to be uncovered. New events and attractions , or familiar building or vistas can be seen from a different angle. The content takes in well-known Londoners top tens;quirkly walks; loveliest views;suggestions for best picnic spots; must-visit restaurants and shops, and unusual takes on well-known attractions.
author: Time Out Guides
